extendedInfo.description: AUTORECORDER !! AUTOSOUND RECORDER!!! VIDEO RECORDER!!! AUTOVIDEO RECORDER!!!With this application we can start an AutoRecord when a configurable noise level is detected. We have advanced options such delayed starts, delayed records, inactivity periods and more.Now itÂ´s possible to recod video instead of audio.In adition we can send Sms and email alerts when the sensor is fired. Â¡Â¡Instant notice something is happening!!It also include a regular WAV/MP3 recorder with pause function and the ability to put comments to our recordings. Of course it is possible to play the recordings and share them through DropBox, WhatsApp...v2: Now itÂ´s possible to record VIDEO instead of audio in autorecord mode.New option to avoid the device turn off.New option to reduce screen brightness while recording.v1.2: New icons.v1.1: Some Translation Fix.KNOW BUGS:By now the device has to be turned on. I have provided a option to low the screen brightness.On some devices the video is recorded or previewed with a 90Âº inversion. For example HTC DESIRE.When a videorecord starts or stops some devices make beeps. This is for legal reasons and  itÂ´s not possible to avoid. If your device is rooted you had better chances to mute it.
